Beth Cummings

Where I am

Web Development apprentice with Bloc with a passion for web accessible development. Currently developing a responsive app to chat with friends live about your favorite shows, Must Chat TV. Built using AngularJS and Firebase's database and authentication systems

Where I'm going

Working for a Chicago based marketing and advertising firm. Building a diverse range of client sites and dipping my toes into new technologies.
